description: 1972 Lamborghini Series II Espada: 5-Speed and 1 of 575 Series II

This Espada is one of only 575 Series II produced and is an extremely desirable 5-speed car. Red with black leather interior, this particular example was owned by Jim Loos, a Lamborghini Dealer in the Bay Area of San Francisco. A very presentable and original car, it runs and drives but could use servicing at this point. Here's an opportunity to own one of Lamborghini's most successful cars ever produced. These cars will only go up in value being part of the Italian Automotive Renaissance from 1945-1975.
